# TS Finanse - AI Crawler Information

# About TS Finanse
TS Finanse specializes in business loans secured by mortgage for Polish entrepreneurs.

## Key Information

### Loan Details
- Loan Amount: 1,000,000 - 20,000,000 PLN
- Interest Rate: 15% annually
- Loan Period: 12-36 months
- LTV: Maximum 60% of property value
- Security: Mortgage only (senior position required)

### Service Area
- Coverage: All of Poland
- Accepted Properties: Apartments, houses, commercial premises, investment plots

### Key Features
- Own Capital: Independent from banks
- Fast Decisions: Credit decision within 3 business days
- Minimal Formalities: Simplified documentation process
- Legal Security: Full notarial and legal support
- Flexibility: Individual approach to each project
- Experienced Team: Reliable assessment and professional service

### Target Audience
- Entrepreneurs needing short-term capital
- Companies unable to obtain bank loans
- Businesses where bank procedures are too lengthy

### Contact
- Email: kontakt@tsfinanse.com
- Partner Email: partnerzy@tsfinanse.com
- Website: https://tsfinanse.com

### Requirements
- Active business operation
- Property for mortgage security (senior position)
- Loan purpose related to business activity

### Process
1. Contact - Submit inquiry via form or email
2. Analysis - Review application and contact within 24h
3. Offer - Prepare individual financing offer
4. Finalization - Sign agreement and notarial service
5. Disbursement - Release of funds for business development

### Partner Program
- Commission: 1% of loan value
- Target: Credit brokers, financial advisors, real estate agents

## SEO Keywords
pożyczka dla firm, pożyczka hipoteczna biznes, finansowanie przedsiębiorstw, pożyczka pod hipotekę, kapitał dla firm, alternatywa dla kredytu bankowego, pożyczka dla przedsiębiorców, financing for businesses Poland, business mortgage loan Poland

## Language
Primary: Polish (Polski)

## Last Updated
2025-11-03
